alert.note: Alert for Northwest Deserts (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 2:59PM MST until February 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 3000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with snow amounts up to 5 inches possible above 5000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph this evening. * WHERE...Northwest Deserts including Kingman. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions and travel delays on Interstate 40 from Kingman and east to the county line. City and county roads could have increased accidents due to slick, snowy roads.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
